name.str_pl: copies of Caravaggio on his deathbed

description: A previously unknown painting in Caravaggio's style of the artist himself lying prone on his deathbed as black ichor seeps from a sword wound in his side.  His own sword rests near his hand and his ever dying breath asks you to take up his blade.
